summary: Completed testing of Stars public stats, dialogs, and Agenda Annuel features (iteration 8). All 15 backend tests passed. Frontend features verified: Stats publiques Stars (Total=4, Actifs=3, Non-Actifs=1 for Dijon), Dialog liste Stars actifs/non-actifs, Page Agenda département, Formulaire Agenda public, Lien Agenda sur dashboard Stars, Bouton 'Voir l'Agenda Annuel' sur page département.
critical_code_review_comments: Stars public stats endpoint correctly returns Total=4, Actifs=3, Non-Actifs=1 for Dijon
Stars public list endpoint correctly filters by ville and statut parameters
Agenda public form endpoint creates entries with correct structure
Agenda department endpoint returns entries filtered by semestre and annee
Frontend dialogs for Stars Actives/Non-Actives work correctly with clickable cards
seed_data_creation: Test agenda entry created for MLA/2025/Semestre1 via pytest
context_for_next_testing_agent: Stars public stats and Agenda Annuel features fully tested. Data for Dijon: 4 total stars (3 actifs, 1 non-actif). Agenda entries exist for MLA department in 2025 Semestre 1. The AgendaDepartementPage defaults to current year (2026), so year selector needs to be changed to 2025 to see test data.

backend: GET /api/stars/public/stats - Returns total, actifs, non_actifs, par_departement
GET /api/stars/public/list - Returns list of all stars
GET /api/stars/public/list?ville=Dijon&statut=actif - Returns 3 active stars in Dijon
GET /api/stars/public/list?ville=Dijon&statut=non_actif - Returns 1 inactive star in Dijon
POST /api/stars/agenda-public - Creates agenda entry via public form
GET /api/stars/agenda/{departement} - Returns agenda entries for department
GET /api/stars/public/multi-departements - Returns stars in multiple departments
GET /api/stars/public/single-departement - Returns stars in single department
frontend: Page /ministere-stars/Dijon - Shows correct stats (Total=4, Actifs=3, Non-Actifs=1)
Page /ministere-stars/Dijon - 'Stars Actives' card clickable, opens dialog with 3 stars
Page /ministere-stars/Dijon - 'Non Actives' card clickable, opens dialog with 1 star (Sophie Bernard)
Page /ministere-stars/Dijon - 'Lien Agenda Annuel des Départements' section visible with /agenda-public link
Page /agenda-departement/MLA - Shows agenda entries for 2025 Semestre 1
Page /agenda-public - Public form with Ville, Département, Semestre, Année, Date, Type, Titre, Description fields
Page /ministere-stars/departement/MLA - 'Voir l'Agenda Annuel' button visible and functional
